wizard.completeAllSteps: Complete all steps to receive your certification

registration.title: Complete Your Registration
registration.description: Fill in your personal information, upload required documents, and declare your education
registration.missingDocumentsDescription: Please upload the following documents before proceeding to payment:
registration.registrationSavedDesc: Your information has been saved successfully.
registration.failedToSave: Failed to save registration details. Please try again.
registration.ageRequirementDesc: You must be at least 16 years old to proceed.

payment.title: Registration Payment
payment.description: Complete the payment to activate your candidate profile
payment.successDesc: You can now proceed to schedule your exam
payment.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please complete the payment to proceed to exam scheduling
payment.registrationFeeDesc: One-time registration fee to activate your candidate profile
payment.examFeeDesc: Fee for scheduling your CBT certification exam

scheduling.title: Schedule Your Exam
scheduling.description: Select your preferred exam date and complete the payment
scheduling.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please select an exam date to complete your scheduling
scheduling.selectWithin30Days: Select any date within the next 30 days
scheduling.examScheduledDesc: Your exam has been scheduled for {{date}}.
scheduling.failedToSchedule: Failed to schedule exam. Please try again.

profile.examNote: Please arrive at the test center 15 minutes before your scheduled time. Bring a valid ID and your exam confirmation.
profile.localExamNote: Please visit your assigned center on the scheduled date. The center admin will initiate your exam.
profile.completeRegToDocs: Complete your registration to upload documents
profile.pdfInNewTab: PDF opened in a new tab
profile.previewNotAvailable: Preview not available for this file type

complete.successMessage: Your registration has been completed and your exam has been scheduled successfully
complete.visitCenter: Visit your assigned center on the scheduled date
complete.bringCNIC: Bring your original CNIC for identity verification
complete.centerAdminExam: The center admin will initiate your exam

certificate.congratsExam: Congratulations on passing your certification exam
certificate.note: Your certificate is registered in the national database and can be verified online using the certificate number.

examWaiting.canBegin: You can now begin your certification exam
examWaiting.availableAtTime: Your exam will be available at the scheduled time

examAuth.enterCredentials: Enter your registered credentials to access the exam
examAuth.validPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
examAuth.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
examAuth.useLaptop: Use a laptop/desktop for best experience
examAuth.waitForAdmin: Wait for the center admin to start the exam
examAuth.agreeToRules: By continuing, you agree to examination rules and policies.

candidateAuth.brandDescription: Register for certification exams, track your progress, complete CBT tests, and download your official government certificates.
candidateAuth.loginDesc: Sign in to access your candidate dashboard
candidateAuth.signupDesc: Register to begin your certification journey
candidateAuth.passwordTooShortDesc: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
candidateAuth.passwordMinChars: Password must be at least 6 characters
candidateAuth.otpSent: OTP sent to your phone number.
candidateAuth.otpDesc: Enter the 6-digit OTP code sent to your phone number to complete your registration.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Enter your official details as per CNIC
personalInfo.ageWarning: You must be at least 16 years old to register.

documents.title: Document Upload
documents.description: Upload high-quality scans of your original documents
documents.dragDrop: Please ensure all documents are clearly legible. Blurry or incorrect documents may lead to registration rejection

education.title: Education Declaration
education.description: Minimum education requirement is 10 years (Matric) for this certification. Candidates with 16 years of education are eligible for advanced modules.
education.has16YearsQuestion: Do you have a Bachelor's degree or equivalent (16 years)?
education.transcriptDesc: Drag and drop your degree or click to browse

candidatePortal.examSubmittedDesc: You have successfully completed your exam. Your results are being processed.
candidatePortal.examAlreadyScheduledDesc: Your exam has been scheduled. View your profile for exam details.
